channel.title: I need a help choosing a server
channel.description:
Well see i am a pretty good coder i can do a little work but i cant find the right scape for me.... Im looking for one you can edit your appearance or one that is capable but u have to code a little... also I need one where NPC's actually talk and give quests. Any ideas??? :confused: pls tell wut would be good for me...
[glow=red,2,300]Im A bit of a n00b on this kinda stuf so pls pls pls pls help.[/glow]

item.title: I need a help choosing a server
item.dc:creator: @Coyle Coyle
item.description:
@Coyle wrote:

cyberscape v1 allows you to edit your characters appearance and if your not bad at coding then you should be able to add quests of your own into that source.

search it if you want to download

-Coyle

Read full topic
